statements: DELETE FROM genetic_data WHERE patient_name = 'Alice' AND test_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM genetic_data WHERE sample_id = 100 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM genetic_data WHERE test_date <= '2022-01-01' AND health_risk_assessment = 'High risk';
DELETE FROM genetic_variants WHERE position = 100 AND chromosome = 'X';
DELETE FROM genetic_tests WHERE test_id = 100 AND patient_id = 50;
DELETE FROM health_risks WHERE risk_name = 'Diabetes Type 2';
